definition: white hair (of animals)/see also 白髮|白发[bai2 fa4]

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
The White Haired Girl (1950), one of the first PRC films

sentences.english: In fact, he was jet black without a spot of white.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，他通体漆黑，不杂一点儿白毛。

sentences.english: Any of a breed of toy dogs having a long, silky white coat.
sentences.chinese: 一种小狗，具有丝状长而直的白毛。

sentences.english: Each time, I have white hair combed forward to it, go home with it.
sentences.chinese: 每当这时，我便梳理着它的白毛，与它一起回家。

sentences.english: All crows are black, and he didn't want to be the solitary white one.
sentences.chinese: 老鸦是一边黑的，他不希望独自成为白毛儿的。

sentences.english: One well-known Chinese ballet is called "The White-haired Girl".
sentences.chinese: 中国一个最著名的芭蕾舞叫“白毛女”。

sentences.english: White hairs ghost Jin Shenglie how it feel able to let him disappointed.
sentences.chinese: 白毛鬼觉得金圣烈怎么就这点能力让他很失望。

sentences.english: The most famous varieties are "silver Needles White Fuzz" and "White Peony".
sentences.chinese: 著名的白茶品种为“白毛银针”和“白牡丹”。

sentences.english: The white-haired girl was named Xi'er.
A bald eagle is a large white-headed eagle .
sentences.chinese: 秃鹰是一种头上有白毛的大鹰。

sentences.english: She played Xi'er in The White-Haired Girl.
She played the part of the White-haired Girl.
sentences.chinese: 中国一个著名的芭蕾舞叫“白毛女”。

sentences.english: White hairs ghosts in front of the show face to suck the blood of his concubine.
sentences.chinese: 白毛鬼当着显祖的面吸他妃子的血。

sentences.english: If I were "White-hair Lady" in modern times, absolutely l wouldn't marry "Huang Shiren".
sentences.chinese: 如果我是当代白毛女，我是绝对不会嫁给黄世仁的。

sentences.english: I love it very much, especially its white and brushy fur.
sentences.chinese: 我非常喜欢兔子，尤其是它那毛茸茸的白毛。

sentences.english: White hairs ghost here think she didnt do anything, to do.
sentences.chinese: 白毛鬼觉得她来这里什么都没做好，来干什么。

sentences.english: White ghost with Jin Shenglie more hate MAO, because he know Jin Shenglie is doing.
sentences.chinese: 白毛鬼跟金圣烈更加恨，因为他知道是金圣烈所做的。

definition: (of an animal) appearance or color of coat
variant of 榔頭|榔头[lang2 tou5]
comb (fleshy crest on a bird's head)
fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)
